title: Finally Rito Gets It
body:
Finally Rito has realized the pure unanymous hatred of teemo.  I quote directly from the Hexakill articale:

We’re turning to familiar ground with the next Featured Game Mode! We’ve hosted Hexakill on Twisted Treeline before, but this time we’re adding in BANS to the mix. Now you can kick out those pesky champs who wreck you while you capture those all-important altars, or just throw a ban at {{champion:17}}  Because, well... {{champion:17}} .

replies.body: P.S. I play {{Champion:17}} and i love him so no judgement.
